original_text: And the standard of the camp of Reuben set forward according to their armies: and over his host was Elizur the son of Shedeur.
korean_text: 다음으로 르우벤 진영의 군기에 속한 자들이 그들의 진영별로 출발하였으니 르우벤의 군대는 스데울의 아들 엘리술이 이끌었고

sentences.original_text: And the standard of the camp of Reuben
set forward according to their armies
was Elizur the son of Shedeur
